pages.community.header.title.description: The title of the header section of the community page

pages.community.header.subtext.message: We are deeply committed to being open-source. That means openly helping each other in improving Lexical. We’ve listed some Lexical-related communities that you should check out.
pages.community.header.subtext.description: The descriptive text of the header section of the community page

page.home.features.reliable.message: Lexical is comprised of editor instances that each attach to a single content editable element. A set of editor states represent the current and pending states of the editor at any given time.
page.home.features.reliable.description: short description of why Lexical is reliable

page.home.features.accessible.message: Lexical is designed for everyone. It follows best practices established in WCAG and is compatible with screen readers and other assistive technologies.
page.home.features.accessible.description: short description of why Lexical is accessible

page.home.features.fast.message: Lexical is minimal. It doesn't directly concern itself with UI components, toolbars or rich-text features and markdown. The logic for these features can be included via a plugin interface.
page.home.features.fast.description: short description of why Lexical is fast

pages.community.contributors.subtext.message: Lexical development is led by small team at Meta. It also receives contributions from people all over the world. Here are just a few members.
pages.community.contributors.subtext.description: The descriptive text of the header section of the community page

pages.community.contributors.gitHubLink.message: See the rest of the contributors on Github.
pages.community.contributors.gitHubLink.description: Link to GitHub's contribute page for the repository

pages.community.howTo.howToSubHeader.description: Subtitle of section on contribution guidelines

pages.community.howTo.beforeParticipatin.message: Before participating in React's communities, please read our
pages.community.howTo.beforeParticipatin.description: Phrase before paragraph listing documents and policies to read before contributing

pages.community.howTo.covenant.description: Phrase about adoption of the contributor covenant policy

pages.community.howTo.guidelines.message: and we expect that all community members adhere to the
pages.community.howTo.guidelines.description: Phrase about our expectations that all contributors adhere to all policies listed herein.

pages.community.howTo.joinUs.message: Once you've read over those, we invite you to join us on the
pages.community.howTo.joinUs.description: Phrase inviting users to join us as contributors after agreeing to the guidelines

pages.community.links.github.description.message: Want to add a new feature or get a bug fixed? Create a pull request or raise an issue.

pages.community.links.stackoverflow.desc.message: Having trouble using Lexical? Just shoot us a question.

pages.community.links.discord.descriptio.message: Let's discuss upcoming features and plans together.
